name: VIP Shuttle
description:
The VIP Shuttle Experience is a free virtual reality experience in a futuristic, urban environment. Complete your mission to get to your important meeting on time by reaching the VIP Shuttle. But be careful, before you have to pass the security-check, meet drones, and after a breath-taking elevator ride you have to prove how courageous you really are ...
Features
• Breath-taking, futuristic atmosphere
• Sophisticated, highly-detailed 3D views
• Storyline with increasing degree of challenges
• Pure fun
